title: Seafood and vegetable risotto
ingredients: ['olive oil', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '175g risotto rice', '60ml white wine, or as needed', '1 fish stock cube dissolved in 450ml of boiling water', 'frozen peas, thawed', '1/2 red pepper, cubed', '100g frozen cod, thawed', '100g mixed shellfish, such as frozen prawns and mussels, thawed', 'fresh parsley, finely chopped', 'freshly ground black pepper', '1/2 lemon, juiced']
